appNameLong.description: The name of the application (long version)

appDescription.message: Find In Google Serp (FIGS) is an easy to use extension to get the position of a website in Google Results

errorDomainNotSet.message: You need to configure the domain you want to look for by clicking right on the extension icon and selecting "options".

errorNotInIncognito.message:
Please use FIGS only in incognito mode for accurate results.

Would you like to switch to incognito and try again?

licenseBrief.message:

successPositionNotification.message: The position for the current keyword has been saved in the clipboard.
